name: It's Just a Phase (Merve)
description:
The Ego and Shadow, locked in parallel, work together to navigate the Lunar cycle and the challenges it brings. Nourish the Ego and Shadow by collecting matching stars to bring about the next Lunar phase while protecting your Self from unsought asteroids coming into your orbit. 

  • [Left]-[Right] Arrow keys to move 
  • Ego (white) collects white stars and protects from white asteroids 
  • Shadow (black) collects black stars and protects from black asteroids
